entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023
